title: Smart Data Models - Grape Transport Container

allOf.description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a grape transport container (trailer, box of grapes, ...).

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type: It has to be grapeTransportContainer

GRAI.description: Property. Global Returnable Asset Identifier according to standard GS1 - Identifier GRAI. Up to 30 characters long, combining numeric and alphabetic characters.

volumeEmpty.description: Property. Volume of container in cubic meters.

weightEmpty.description: Property. Weight of empty container in kilograms.

currentWeight.description: Property. Weight of the container as last weighted (currently) with cargo (grapes) in kilograms.

healthCondition.description: Property. Health condition of grapes, 100% being fully healthy.

intakeTimestamp.description: Property. UNIX timestamp of when the container was delivered and emptied to winery.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

currentlyFromVineyardBlock.description: Relationship. Reference to the vineyard block from which the grapes are in container.
